name: Formfolio
description: Effortlessly create a personalized portfolio website in minutes by just filling out a simple form.

name: QueryPDF
description: QueryPDF is a FastAPI-based web application that allows users to upload PDFs and ask questions about the content. It leverages LangChain and Google Generative AI for natural language processing and provides detailed responses by creating and searching through text embeddings.

name: Accomplish
description: SaaS site focusing on responsive design using Tailwind CSS and animations with Framer Motion.

name: Coursify
description: Coursify is a full-stack web application designed to manage and deliver online courses. It provides an intuitive user interface for both administrators and users.

name: Smart Attendance System using OpenCV
description: It is an attendance system based on facial recognition

name: Plant ID
description: A Flutter app for identifying plants using the device's camera. This app allows users to take a picture of a plant, and it provides information about the identified plant.

name: TEAM 11
description: All-in-one cricket site where you can check the latest scores, and news and play fantasy games.
language: HTML / CSS / JavaScript / NodeJS / Flask / MySQL
